result.pre: virus (ONNV) is a mosquito-borne arthritogenic alphavirus. ONNV-infected patients display
result.post: clinical symptoms of low-grade fever, self-limiting polyarthralgia, and other

result.pre: acute clinical symptoms of low-grade fever, self-limiting polyarthralgia, and other
result.post: manifestations like lymphadenopathy, generalized maculopapular skin rash, and rare

result.pre: like lymphadenopathy, generalized maculopapular skin rash, and rare occurrences of
result.post: gums and nosebleeds (1, 2). There are also cases

result.pre: ONNV cases are often underestimated and misdiagnosed for other endemic
result.post: with more pronounced, overlapping symptoms, such as chikungunya virus
